miniapp.name: Top Casts
miniapp.subtitle: Daily ranking of casts
miniapp.description: See the best Farcaster casts at a glance. We track replies, likes and recasts, aggregate the last 24 hours and rank posts by engagement.
miniapp.tagline: Top Farcaster posts in one app
miniapp.ogDescription: Best Farcaster casts of the last 24 hours by replies, likes and recasts.
